title: A declaration by James Earl of Carlile, Lord of the Caribee Islands, or province of Carliola. Manifesting his care of, and affection to, the good and welfare of the inhabitants of the island of Barbadoes, and of all other people under his government.
author: Carlisle, James Hay, Earl of, ca. 1612-1660.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 13. Ld Willowby of Parham".
Dated at end: Given under our hand and Seale, at London this 22 day of November Anno Dom. 1647.
Identified on UMI microfilm set Early English books as Wing C594a.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books) and in the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
